197947.「ハ…ハ～イ ミヤビちゃん！\n ひさしぶり～ 元気してた～？:
H...hey, Miyabi! Long time no see!
How you been?

197948.「オーイッ！ ミヤビっち～！\n 遊び人 やめたって聞いたけど ウソっしょ！？\:
Hey, hey! Miyabi! What's this about quitting
being a gadabout?! It's not true, is it?!
By the way, do you know that Deathwork guy?

197950.「仕事中だって 見たら わかるでしょ！\n デスワークなんて 知らないし～っ！\:
You can see that I'm working, can't you?! I
don't know anything about Deathwork! I stopped
that gadabout junk a long time ago!!

197951.「ガビィーン！！ オーッ ミヤビィーッ！\n アソビニン やめちまうなんて トン:
*GAAAAAAASP*! Oh, MIYABI!! You quit being a
gadabout?! That's OUTRAGEOUS!!

197952.「……マ？ マジっすか～？ 労働嫌いで有名な\n あの孤高のイタ映え女王 ミヤビ:
....Huh? Is this for real? The woman who's
notoriously known for hating manual labor, the
mischievous and glamorous queen, Miyabi...
<bk>
What on earth happened to make her do
something like this?

197953.「……キッカケは ともかく～ッ アタシは\n 農家として生きていくことに 決めた:
I decided to become a farmer! I was awakened
by the dangers of working!

197954.「最近は ぜんぜん寝てないくらい 働いてて～。\n もうまじ ハタケ中毒……って:
I've been working so hard lately that I haven't slept at all. I'm really addicted to hatake! I can't think of anything else but
hatake right now!

197955.「……なのに～ ここんとこ ハタケの元気が\n ビミョーだから ガチで 手が離せ: I don't have time to talk to you guys!

197956.「……そーゆーことだから\n 仕事のジャマ しないでくれる？\n ハナシは終わり:
So... can you stop interrupting my work,
please? End of story! You're interrupting my
work!

197957.「ミヤビちゃん…… ああは言ってたけど\n あんまり 楽しそーじゃなかったね～。:
Miyabi... you said so, but you didn't seem to
be having much fun. It's tough, but you have
to do it, right?

197958.「それなー。寝不足なのか しんどそーだった。\n あれが 労魔デスワークの仕業だ:
That's right. He looked like he was having a hard time sleeping. If that was the work of Labor Demon Deathwork, I can't leave him
alone.

197960.「ミヤビっち 畑の元気がなくて\n 手が離せないって 言ってたよな。だったら\n:
Miyabi, you said that the fields are not healthy and you can't take your hands off them. Well, let's help him out with some good
fertilizer!

197961.「……で <pc>っち！\n ちと 悪いんだけど\n 肥料の件は ぜんぶ まかせ:
So, <pc>! I'm sorry, but I'll leave
the fertilizer thing entirely to you!

197962.「えっ <pc>さんだけに まかせるんす？\n そりゃあ アゲアゲな <pc>さ:
What? You're just going to let handle it? Well, if you're a big fan of , you might be able to get away
with it, but... what about us?

197963.「ヘヘッ そこはそれ。オレらには\n ちと 別件で やることがあるんだわ～。: That's the thing. We have other things to do.

197964.「いいか～ この村の近くにある 知恵の社で\n 肥料のことを調べて バッチリ手に:
Listen up~ We'll go to the Wisdom Altar near this village, check out the fertilizer, and get it right. Then we'll reconvene at Miyabi's
place!

197965.「知恵の社は ツスクル平野の北西にあるぜ～。\n <pc>っち 肥料のことは シ:
Wisdom Altar is located in the northwest of Tsusukul Plains! , please take care of the fertilizer! So, it's time to call
it a day~!

197966.「……なにこれ？ このエナジーパウダーをまけば\n ハタケが 元気になるって？:
What is this? This Energy Powder is supposed
to make the hatake healthier? No way! You're a
gadabout and you're really saying that?

197967.「……でも せっかく 持ってきてくれたなら\n ちょっとだけ 試してみよっかな。:
But since you brought it here, I'll give it a
try.

197968.「……アタシ 最近 ハタケのこと わかるの。\n ハタケのバイブス…… ぐんぐん:
Lately I've been getting to know Hatake. His
vibes are moving up rapidly. Your fertilizer
seems to have done the trick!

197969.「ひゅーっ！ さすがは <pc>っち！\n もう肥料を見つけて 畑にまいてくれた:
Whew! That's what I'm talking about,
<pc>! I see you've already found the
fertilizer and spread it on the fields.

197970.「アハハ！ ミヤビっち～ 遅れてスマン。\n ちと 作るのに 手こずっちまってさ:
Ahahaha! Miyabi~ Sorry I'm late. It took me a
while to make it, but... here it is! Present
for you!

197972.「安眠香っつーお香！ 寝てないって言ってたろ？\n なんか ミヤビっち しんどそ:
Sleeping incense! You said you didn't sleep, right? Miyabi seemed to be having a hard time. It's fine to work, but at least get a good
night's sleep!

197973.「はぁ～？ アンタたち さっきから\n 遊び人のクセして なんで やさしいの！？:
Huh? You guys are such gadabouts, why are you
being so nice to me! You're really funny! I
can't believe it!

197974.「……でも ありがたく 受け取っとく！\n チョー うれしい！ まじ ありがと！:
But I received it gratefully! I'm so
happy! Thank you!

197975.「<pc>さんに 肥料を頼んでる間に\n オレたちで 安眠香を作ってたんすよ～！:
While we were asking <pc> for
fertilizer, we were making our own sleeping
incense~! Oh man, that was a lot of work!

197976.「ルッチーさんは ペアレンツから教わって\n 調合の心得も あるんすわ！\n サ:
Mr. Lucchie learned from the Parents and has a knack for mixing and blending! He can make a sleeping incense so quickly and easily, it's
amazing~!

197977.「……あのさ。いろいろ 助けてもらったし？\n なんか お礼がしたいんだけど……:
You know... You helped me a lot. I'd like to
thank you in some way, but I haven't grown any
vegetables yet, so...

197978.「アハハッ！ 野菜も 気になるんだけどさ～\n オレっち ミヤビっちが 遊び人を:
Hahaha! I'm curious about vegetables too, but
I want to know why Miyabi and I stopped
playing gadabouts. Please tell me.

197979.「……ふーん。そんなのでイイなら 話したげる。\n でも じつは ハッキリ覚えて:
Hmmm... I'll tell you if that's okay. But the
truth is, I don't remember it clearly.

197980.「それが……ある夜 突然 働きたくなったの。\n 遊び人とか まじムダだって 急:
Then... one night, all of a sudden, I wanted to work. I suddenly realized that gadabouts were a waste of time. And the next day, I was
already growing hatake.

197981.「ある夜……？ ミヤビっち。\n その日のこと くわしく 思いだせる？:
One night...? Miyabi. Do you remember that day
any more?

197982.「……うーん。なんかぁ～\n 記憶が ボンヤリしてんだけどぉ～。:
Hmmm... I don't know... my memory is a little
fuzzy...

197983.「あ～っ！ そういえば！ イタ映え絶景のこと\n 話した日があったじゃん！ 遊び:
Ahhh! Oh, by the way! There was the day I told you about the Ita Ei Ei Ei Zekkei! The day I quit being a gadabout was the day I met
Lucchie at the Gadabode!

197985.「そうだ……思いだした。\n そんで 遊びハウスに 寄った帰り道……\n 怪しげ:
That's right...I remember now. On my way home
from the Gadabode, I met two suspicious-
looking couples.

197986.「……ピエロとバニーの格好をした ふたり組に。: ...to a pair dressed as a clown and a bunny.

197987.「……ピエロとバニーのふたり組？\n それが もしかして 労魔デスワーク……？:
A couple of clowns and bunnies? Is that
perhaps Labor Demon Deathwork...?

197988.「ごめん。思いだせたのは ここまで。\n ……あんま 役に立たなそーだよね。:
Sorry. This is all I could remember. ...I
don't think it's very useful.

197989.「いやいや～！ 充分だよ ミヤビっち。\n 忙しいとこ ジャマしたね。まじ 助か:
No, no~! That's enough, Miyabi. Sorry to
interrupt your busy time. Thank you so much!
Let me know when the vegetables are ready!

197990.「<pc>っちも 肥料 サンキューな！\n ……とりま 今回の目的は果たせたし\:
<pc>, thanks for the fertilizer!
Well, now that we've accomplished what we set
out to do, let's go back to the Gadabode!
